alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Collier and central Hendry Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from Big Corkscrew Island to near Royal Palm Hammock. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marco Island, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Everglades City, Immokalee, Plantation Island, Carnestown, Orangetree, Copeland, Big Corkscrew Island, Royal Palm Hammock, Felda, Marco Island Airport, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Bunker Hill, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Miles City, Deep Lake, Lake Trafford and South Blocks Golde. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
